retweeted_status.full_text: I wrote about growing pressure on corporate sponsors and political leaders over the 2022 Olympics in Beijing. As you can imagine from the current H&M/Nike blow-up over Xinjiang, the companies I contacted about their Olympic sponsorships were not responsive https://t.co/CtTJJqB6mG
